H0.text: In the acronym REM, which describes stage of sleep during which dreams occur, for what does the R stand . Restorative

H1.text: In the acronym REM, which describes stage of sleep during which dreams occur, for what does the R stand . Relaxation

H2.text: In the acronym REM, which describes stage of sleep during which dreams occur, for what does the R stand . Recuperative

H3.text: In the acronym REM, which describes stage of sleep during which dreams occur, for what does the R stand . RAPID

A4.text: Rapid eye movement sleep (REM sleep or REMS) is a unique phase of sleep in mammals (including humans) and birds, characterized by random rapid movement of the eyes

A5.text: REM stands for 'rapid eye movement', this mode of sleep has many other aspects
